title: The Chase star Mark 'The Beast' Labbett shows off incredible weight-loss
text:

Quiz show legend Mark Labbett paid a visit to a Teesside pub to take part in its quiz night this week.

The Chaser, 54, showed off his incredible weight-loss as he stopped off at The Cleveland Bay pub in Eaglescliffe.

Photographers snapped away at Mark's slimmed down figure as he celebrated the pub's champion quiz team.

Mark visited the pub as The Four Tops were recently awarded first place in the Great British Pub Quiz national finals.

(Image: Press Gazette)

(Image: Press Gazette)

Just last year, The Beast revealed that he had lost a whopping 2.5 stone over the last six months.

Over the last half a year, Mark has been cracking down on his eating habits and reducing his sugar intake.

Mark's appearance at the pub comes amid his recent reconciliation with his cheating wife and second cousin Kate.

The Chase star announced he had split from his wife of five years Katie, 26, in May after it emerged that she had been seeing someone else for the past year.

(Image: Press Gazette)

During an appearance on Loose Women last month, Mark retreated.

He told the panel: "Like a lot of relationships, you go through a rough patch. We’re working our way through it.

"A newspaper offered us a sum of money and we kindly denied. We're quite private, there's no pictures of our son online and I'm not going to name him until he's old enough to make the decision.

(Image: Tom Dymond/REX/Shutterstock)

Panelist Denise Welch asked whether they were still together and Mark flashed his wedding ring.

The couple, who have one son, decided to go their separate ways after images emerged showing Katie on a date with metal worker Scott in May.

The Chase airs weekdays from 5pm on ITV.
description: The 54-year-old telly Chaser appeared to have dropped a few pounds when he stopped off at a pub quiz in Teeside
